name: publish
signature: { <A>(value: A): (self: PubSub<A>) => Effect<boolean, never, never>; <A>(self: PubSub<A>, value: A): Effect<boolean, never, never>; }
description:
Publishes a message to the `PubSub`, returning whether the message was published
to the `PubSub`.
documentation:
Publishes a message to the `PubSub`, returning whether the message was published
to the `PubSub`.
